mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.serial AS serial,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.type_id AS typeId,A.type_code AS typeCode,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.dict_code AS dictCode,A.user_id AS userId,A.control_type_id AS controlTypeId,A.start_date AS startDate,A.end_date AS endDate,A.link_type AS linkType,A.link_id AS linkId,A.owner_id AS ownerId,A.owner_ids AS ownerIds,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_str2 AS attrStr2,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.attr_int2 AS attrInt2,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
, u.username, u.real_name AS realName, u.serial AS userSerial,d.dict_name AS controlType

sql.if: AND A.start_date < NOW() AND A.end_date > NOW()

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN user u ON A.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN dict d ON d.id = A.control_type_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
